tool_description: Global time-series weather data including parameters for PV modelling, building energy simulation and wind-power generation. Hourly coverage from 1940 to 16-day forecast.
name: OikoWeather
title: OikoWeather

api_list.name: Weather Data
api_list.description: Hourly historical and forecast weather parameters in time-series format, from 1940 to 16 days ahead for any location.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude(s). If location is not provided. Up to 100 locations allowed.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude(s). If location is not provided. Up to 100 locations allowed.

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: End date. Defaults to 7 days into the future. Provided time is interpreted as UTC.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Start date. Defaults to 3 days into the past. Provided time is interpreted as UTC.
